Methods

ApplyState()

Applies the state of Source to this DrawNode for use in rendering. The applied state must remain immutable.

public override void ApplyState()

Binds and initialises an IFrameBuffer if required.

The IFrameBuffer to bind.

Parameters

Draw(IRenderer)

Draws this DrawNode to the screen.

protected override sealed void Draw(IRenderer renderer)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

The renderer to draw with.

Remarks

Subclasses must invoke 

base.Draw()
prior to drawing vertices.

DrawContents(IRenderer)

Draws the applicable effect buffers of SharedData to the back buffer.

protected virtual void DrawContents(IRenderer renderer)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

GetDrawVersion()

Retrieves the version of the state of this DrawNode. The BufferedDrawNode will only re-render if this version is greater than that of the rendered IFrameBuffers.

protected virtual long GetDrawVersion()

Returns

long

A version representing this DrawNode's state.

Remarks

By default, the BufferedDrawNode is re-rendered with every DrawNode invalidation.

PopulateContents(IRenderer)

Populates the contents of the effect buffers of SharedData. This is invoked after Child has been rendered to the main buffer.

protected virtual void PopulateContents(IRenderer renderer)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer
